issues.description: Hero CTA may be buried below fold on mobile with 2-column layout compression
issues.rationale: 60/40 desktop grid likely stacks poorly on mobile, pushing primary CTA below critical 8-second window

issues.description: Pricing moved earlier creates premature sticker shock before value establishment
issues.rationale: Pricing after Suite section occurs before users understand full value prop, increasing bounce risk

issues.description: Proof bar placement creates visual competition with hero CTA for attention
issues.rationale: Trust elements directly under hero may dilute primary conversion focus and create scanning confusion

issues.description: Audit log pattern lacks clear connection to core value proposition clarity
issues.rationale: Technical observability features may confuse non-technical entrepreneurs seeking simple business launch

issues.description: Section reordering buries How It Works after proof, reducing mechanism comprehension
issues.rationale: Users need to understand process before trusting proof points, current order reverses logical flow

issues.description: Visibility panel adds cognitive load without clear business benefit explanation
issues.rationale: Status indicators may overwhelm users who want simple business launch, not technical monitoring

issues.description: 48px button height may create tap target issues on smaller mobile screens
issues.rationale: Large buttons in constrained mobile hero space may force awkward spacing or text wrapping

issues.description: 3-column proof layout may compress poorly on mobile requiring horizontal scroll
issues.rationale: Mobile screens cannot accommodate 3 proof chips without sacrificing readability or forcing scroll

issues.description: 16px body text with 1.5 line-height may increase page length and scroll fatigue
issues.rationale: Larger text increases vertical space consumption, potentially burying conversion elements

issues.description: Pricing card standardization may reduce visual distinction between plan tiers
issues.rationale: Identical card structure could make tier differences less obvious, slowing decision-making

suggestedFixes.fix: Test single-column mobile stack with CTA above fold at 320px viewport, maintain 60/40 desktop only
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures primary conversion element remains visible in critical mobile scanning window

suggestedFixes.fix: Move pricing after How It Works section to allow value establishment before price reveal
suggestedFixes.rationale: Follows conversion best practice of value-first, price-second to reduce sticker shock

suggestedFixes.fix: Position proof bar after hero CTA with 40px spacing buffer to avoid attention competition
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains trust building while preserving hero conversion focus and clear visual hierarchy

suggestedFixes.fix: Add explanatory header 'Track Your Business Setup Progress' above audit log component
suggestedFixes.rationale: Connects technical feature to business outcome, making value clearer for non-technical users

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder to Hero → How It Works → Proof bar → Problem/Solution → Pricing → Trust panels
suggestedFixes.rationale: Establishes process understanding before social proof, following logical persuasion sequence

suggestedFixes.fix: Frame visibility panel as 'Business Health Dashboard' with entrepreneur-focused metrics
suggestedFixes.rationale: Repositions technical monitoring as business intelligence tool relevant to target audience

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 44px height on mobile with 48px desktop, maintain 16px horizontal padding minimum
suggestedFixes.rationale: Follows mobile accessibility guidelines while preserving desktop prominence and touch targets

suggestedFixes.fix: Stack proof chips vertically on mobile with 2-column layout at 768px+ breakpoint
suggestedFixes.rationale: Prevents horizontal scroll issues while maintaining proof visibility across device sizes

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 16px body with 1.4 line-height to reduce vertical space while maintaining readability
suggestedFixes.rationale: Balances readability with page length concerns, keeping conversion elements above fold

suggestedFixes.fix: Add visual accent (colored border or background) to recommended plan card for distinction
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains standardized structure while highlighting optimal choice through visual hierarchy
